statements: DELETE FROM packaging_defects WHERE quality_rating < 3 AND date_recorded < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM packaging_defects WHERE severity > 5 AND location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM defect_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 10 AND analysis_result LIKE '%defect%' AND relevant_defect_types IN ('Crack', 'Scratch');
DELETE FROM inspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Fail' AND inspector_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM defects WHERE defect_name = 'Scratched' AND defect_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
DELETE FROM inspection_records WHERE defect_id IN (SELECT defect_id FROM packaging_defects WHERE defect_date < '2022-01-01');
